backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister implementing products, orders, users, cart, wishlist, ratings, merchant config, and credential management with access control and storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to impacted frontend files, components, and test IDs for recent auth and UI workflow updates.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing various frontend components, pages, and styling updates across the app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH-driven theme tokens for light/dark mode and applying global background and text styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point that loads the React app and sets the favicon and page metadata.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main routing configuration for all public, account, support, and admin pages using TanStack Router inside the app shell.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminGuard: Admin-only wrapper that checks admin status, shows loading or access denied states, and renders children for authorized users.
frontend/src/components/auth/InAppBrowse: Component detecting in-app browsers and blocking sign-in, offering external browser redirect and link copy options with user guidance.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Renders a login/logout button that navigates to login or clears sessions on sign-out.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Wraps protected content, handling guest mode, loading states, and prompting for sign-in.
frontend/src/components/checkout/UpiPaym: Displays UPI payment QR, deep link, and copy-to-clipboard with merchant config fallback.
frontend/src/components/home/BannerCarou: Auto‑advancing banner carousel with looping slides.
frontend/src/components/home/HomeSearchB: Search bar with debounced queries showing product and category suggestions and navigation.
Main app layout with header, footer, routing outlet, guest notices, and profile setup modal.
frontend/src/components/layout/BrandHead: Top navigation bar with logo, search, cart, account actions, login button, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/layout/MobileBot: Bottom mobile navigation bar linking to catalog, cart, and account with active state highlighting.
frontend/src/components/product/ProductC: Displays a product card with image, rating, price, and actions to add to cart or wishlist using backend mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/product/ProductS: Renders a horizontally scrollable section of ProductCard components under a title.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Modal form for creating a user profile with name, email, and phone, submitting via a save-profile mutation.
frontend/src/constants/auth.ts: Defines minimum password and username lengths for authentication validation.
frontend/src/constants/upi.ts: Provides UPI merchant constants and helpers to build deep links and retrieve the QR code path.
Documentation describing the admin activation flow, validation, backend behavior, and error mapping.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminActivation.ts: Mutation hook that validates a 4‑digit activation code and calls bootstrapAdmin, then refreshes role state.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthSession.ts: Determines signed‑in state from session auth or Internet Identity and returns user role status.
frontend/src/hooks/useBootstrapAdmin.ts: Simple alias hook that re-exports useAdminActivation.
frontend/src/hooks/useCallerPrincipal.ts: Fetches the caller's principal from the backend when an actor and identity are available.
frontend/src/hooks/useCallerUserProfileS: Safely fetches the caller’s user profile only when the user is signed in and an actor is ready.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserRole.ts: Retrieves and exposes the caller’s role with convenience flags and loading state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, managing login, logout, and identity state via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data such as products, categories, cart, ratings, and user profiles.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables for app-wide styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app root, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/account/AccountLoginP: Implements login UI with Google or phone sign‑in, guest mode, and in‑app browser blocking.
frontend/src/pages/account/AccountPage.t: Displays account overview with sign‑in, guest mode, profile access, and sign‑out actions.
frontend/src/pages/account/AccountSignup: Provides username/password signup with validation, hashed credential storage, and redirects after creation.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminActivatePa: Shows admin activation notice and auto‑redirects users to the admin dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminAnalyticsP: Displays analytics metrics including sales, orders, products, and top items for admins.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCustomersP: Shows customer management info noting blockchain‑secured user profiles.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard linking to product, order, customer, analytics, support, and payment settings sections.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Admin UI for viewing, filtering, and updating order statuses using backend queries.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Admin interface to list products and create new products or categories with image upload support.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSupportTic: Admin page showing a placeholder alert explaining the demo support ticket system.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminUpiConfigP: Form-based admin page for viewing and updating UPI merchant configuration via backend mutations.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Shows the user's cart with item management, totals, and navigation to checkout, requiring authentication.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogPage.tsx: Displays the product catalog with category, price, and search filtering plus sorting options.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Implements a multi-step checkout flow including address entry, payment selection, and order placement.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page fetching products and categories, displaying carousels and product sections, and linking to catalog pages.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Protected notifications page showing a placeholder card when no notifications exist.
frontend/src/pages/OrderDetailPage.tsx: Order detail page with tracking, item listing, and invoice download, requiring authentication.
frontend/src/pages/OrdersPage.tsx: Lists user orders with sorting and navigation to order details, showing placeholders when empty or loading.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed product info with cart, wishlist, and rating actions, including image handling and authentication checks.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Authenticated profile page allowing users to view and update personal information.
frontend/src/pages/support/FaqPage.tsx: Public FAQ page displaying common questions with collapsible accordion items and support navigation.
frontend/src/pages/support/SupportTicket: Authenticated page showing placeholder details for a specific support ticket.
Authenticated page for creating and listing locally stored support tickets with a modal form.
frontend/src/pages/WishlistPage.tsx: Shows user wishlist items by mapping product IDs to product data, with empty and loading states.
frontend/src/utils/copyToClipboard.ts: Utility providing modern and legacy fallback methods to copy text to the clipboard.
frontend/src/utils/detectInAppBrowser.ts: Utility to detect in-app browsers via user-agent patterns and return a friendly browser name.
frontend/src/utils/extractBackendErrorMe: Parses various backend error shapes to extract a readable message, falling back to nested fields or stringified patterns.
frontend/src/utils/guestSession.ts: Manages a guest browsing mode using sessionStorage with methods to check, enable, and clear the state.
frontend/src/utils/openExternalBrowser.t: Attempts to open the current URL in a new browser window and returns whether the action succeeded.
frontend/src/utils/simpleAuthSession.ts: Stores and retrieves simple session-based auth state (Google or phone) in sessionStorage, with helpers for sign-in and sign-out.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins including typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes the project's current state and features, focusing on replacing Internet Identity with simple Google and phone sign-in flows.
